name: VoidFront
description:
In the year 2077,

A NASA-appointed astronaut visits planets that are about to die in few decades using a portal. His job is to collect Samples of Minerals from the planet for further researches.

On his very first Mission, He crash-landed through the portal and landed on a Meteoroids Cloud which is being absorbed slowly by a huge void. "Player needs to react quickly because he Running out of space and time to reach his Mothership"

The player needs to make his way to the helmet and gun to fight real terrifying Enemies and survive on the planet by collecting Minerals for health regeneration and energy. player needs to reach the main broken spaceship to assemble his jetpacks and leave the Metroid cloud through the portal where he came from.

Push through till the player reach their final goal!

How to Play:

Use WASD to move and the mouse to look around, you can shoot enemies(Left mouse button) while you progress through the level

You can collect Matter Energy to Replenish your health Bar.

Enjoy!

Controls:

  • Movement: "W,A,S,D".
  • Attack: "Left Mouse Click"
  • Mouse: "Camera"
  • Space: "Jump"
  • Esc: "Pause"

Team:

  • Dilan Hewathudella﻿
  • Karthi Keyan﻿ SP
  • Supun Ravisanka﻿

Install Instructions:

  • Download .zip
  • Extract .zip file
  • Double-click on .exe
